A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't imagine how the critics are in such a consensus that this movie was that good. Thought Rian Johnson was trying to shock and awe too much. Also seemed like he either hated everything about the established universe or didn't care. Had it's good and bad but really disliked the forced humor; made me cringe on quite a few occasions. All in all it was enjoyable to watch but left me disappointed.
